channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2013 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.10.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.10.0 Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. In this release, you will find a number of bug fixes. See product’s documentation for details. : Starting from release 1.9.0 there are several versions of jar library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperReports): for JasperReports 5.0.0/5.1.0 and higher (aspose.words.jasperreports-5.1.0.jar) for JasperReports 4.7.0 (aspose.words.jasperreports-4.7.0.jar) for JasperReports 3.

item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.9.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.9.0 Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. In this release, you will find a number of new features as well as bug fixes. See product’s documentation for details. This release includes support of JasperReports 5.1.0 as major update. : Starting from this release there will be several versions of jar library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperReports):
